Texts.Eng:
Space Dragons!
    
  Diet: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Health x^green;1.3^reset;, -^green;40^reset;% Hunger Drain, +^green;2^reset;Defense
  Resist: +^green;50^reset;% Fire, +^green;15^reset;% Physical
  Immunity: Burning
  Tech: ^green;Fire Breath^reset;
  ^green;Periodically emit flames when below 50% Health^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes:
    Health & Defense x^red;0.8^reset;
  ^green;Volcanic, Magma, Mountainous and Desert^reset;:
    Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Broadsword/Drill: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resistance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Resist: -^red;50^reset;% Ice
  Energy x^red;0.8^reset;
